question: about
answer: The Central Library at IISER Berhampur is the main resource center for academic and research activities. It provides a wide range of resources to support students and faculty, including electronic and print collections, research support, and training programs.

question: services
answer: Services include WebOPAC, Journals, e-Books, Research Support Tools, Training & Workshops, Document Delivery Services (DDS), and Study Tools.

question: rules
answer: Eligibility: Students, faculty, and staff of IISER Berhampur. Membership required. External members may also join. Borrowing limit: 2 weeks, ₹10/day late fine.

question: general_guidelines
answer: Strict silence must be maintained inside the library.
Consumption of food and drinks is prohibited.
Use of mobile phones is allowed in silent mode only for accessing mobile-based library services.
Mutilation of books in any form will lead to a fine or replacement of the book.
Users must carry their institute identity card for borrowing books.
Reference books, journals, and magazines are for consultation within the library only.
